method.step: Wash the Moong daal. Put it in pressure cooker pan. Add water to it and cook the daal in pressure cooker for about 25 min (until 4-5 whistles).
When the cooker cools down, remove the daal and keep aside.
Chop the tomatos finely and keep aside.
Heat the oil in a frying pan and add Asafoetida, mustard seeds and cumin seeds. When the seeds crackle, add curry leaves
When the curry leaves change color (from dark green to light green), add tomatos, turmeric powder, red chilli, garam masala and salt.
Stir it, heat it for 15 seconds and add the cooked Moong daal in it. Keep stirring. Let it simmer for 2 min.
Add chopped coriander and the Moong daal is ready to serve. (Can serve to about 3 people. It can be consumed along with plain rice)
